src_original: 16917 sannahya sarvasattvāparityāginā bhavitavyam/  sarvasattvānām antike mayā  sarvasattvā mayā tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvāpayitavyāḥ/
17001 sarvasattvān api mayā parinirvāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ parinirvāpito bhavati/  17002 tat kasya hetoḥ/
avyavakīrṇena mayā  17003 sarvākārajñatācittena ṣāṭsu pāramitāsu caritavyam/

sarvatrānugatāyāṃ sarvadharma-  17004 prativedhapariniṣpattyāṃ mayā śikṣitavyam/  ekatayābhinirhāro mayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ  17005 pratiboddhavyaḥ yāvat pāramitābhinirhāra{prativedhāya mayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ śikṣitavyam/
